nodes.name: getProposals

nodes.name: canVote

nodes.documentation: @return start time as Unix Standard Time
nodes.name: getStartTime

nodes.documentation: @return end time as Unix Standard Time
nodes.name: getEndTime

nodes.documentation: @return the list of addresses of entities
nodes.name: getProtocolAddresses

nodes.documentation: @return the list of vote weights against all proposals
nodes.name: getVoteTallies

nodes.documentation: @return the list of voter count against all proposals
nodes.name: getVoterCounts

nodes.documentation: @return an integer which specifies the above mentioned amount
nodes.name: getVoterBaseDenominator
